sorular.soru: Which drivers are not to be expected on the carriageway here?

feedback.metin: Next to the carriageway lies a mandatory cycle/moped path. This means that cyclists, snorfietsers and moped and speed pedelec riders are obligated to use the cycle/moped path instead of the carriageway. Only brommobiel drivers are not allowed on this path. So you should expect brommobiel drivers on the carriageway.
